content:
Touchstone TestScript Editor IDE 1.1.0 - August 6, 2018

Learn how to join a growing pool of international FHIR Test Script authors.

New HTML Manual - https://touchstone.aegis.net/touchstone/userguide/html/testscript-authoring/testscript-editor.html#testscript-editor

New HTML - Release Notes location - https://touchstone.aegis.net/touchstone/userguide/html/release-notes/ide.html

Enhancements
•Java JRE is now included in the TestScript Editor so user would not need to install Java.
•New toolbar menu item for contacting Touchstone Support.
